ðŸ“– Summary: StreamGrid is a cross-platform application built with Electron, React, and TypeScript that allows users to create custom multi-stream layouts with drag-and-drop functionality. It supports various streaming platforms like YouTube, Twitch, and local files, offering features like chat integration and grid management for different viewing scenarios.
